metadata.description: Import of data into Visma Løn via decentralized registration, including requirements for file format and fields.

content:
| 1 | A | Customer ID | 6 | Key NumericMandatory |   | Customer ID is a fixed number created by Visma Løn |
| 2 | B | Employer | 6 | Key NumericMandatory |   |   |
| 3 | C | Identification | 11 | Key CharactersMandatoryFixed value | MLE-27-HRME |   |
| 4 | D | Employee | 15 | Key NumericMandatory |   | Employee number |
| 5 | E | CPR no. | 10 | NumericMandatory | XXXXXXXXXX | A Modulus 11 check is performed on the field. Fictitious civil reg. numbers xxxxxx9991 or xxxxxx9992 are valid. If cpr.nr. is ficitionous field 19 and 21 must have ’Nej’ for No. Value x must include a valid date. Format XXXXXXXXXX |
| 6 | F | CVR no. | 8 | Numeric(Mandatory) | XXXXXXXX | A Modulus 11 check is performed on the field. The field is left blank if the CPR no is provided. The field is only populated if the value provided for the CPR no is 0 (zero). Format: XXXXXXXX |
| 7 | G | Last name | 30 | Characters(Mandatory) |   | Mandatory for creating a new employee |
